thread.title: Vince Carter ejected after sending Devin Booker to the ground with an elbow
thread.title_full: Vince Carter ejected after sending Devin Booker to the ground with an elbow

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Vince Carter ejected after sending Devin Booker to the ground with an elbow
text:
Vince Carter was fed up with the young kids.
Vince Carter is 40-years-old. Devin Booker is 20-years-old. When 20-year-old Devin Booker gets on the nerves of 40-year-old Vince Carter, this is what happens next.
Carter was ejected from the game after an official review which is not surprising. It clearly was not a basketball play. Vince probably thought he was hit first, and he was, so he retaliated with a vicious right elbow. Vince isn’t known as a dirty player so it’s actually a little fun to see he’s still got plenty of fight left.
